A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie does not deserve the hate it's been getting. Though I love the Star wars movies dearly\, this is probably the first Star Wars movie that had a truly compelling overall message. The cinematography is absolutely gorgeous and it's beautifully shot. There are plot conveniences and plot lines that aren't completely necessary\, but that's present in many movies and I found it rather easy to look past\, especially since I think the side plots really helped strengthen the movie's themes. I would rank this movie right up there with A New Hope and The Emipire Strikes Back.
